hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for car rental in Morocco since 2009

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2009, our car rental agency was born from a passion for facilitating travel in Morocco. What started as a small family business in Casablanca with just 20 vehicles has grown into one of the leading car rental companies in the kingdom.
story.paragraph2: Our mission is simple: to offer our customers reliable, modern vehicles tailored to their needs, while guaranteeing exceptional customer service. Whether you are a tourist discovering the wonders of Morocco or a resident needing a temporary vehicle, we have the perfect solution for you.
story.paragraph3: Today, with over 500 vehicles and 15 agencies spread across Morocco's major cities, we continue to innovate and improve our services to remain your trusted partner for all your mobility needs.

security.title: Security
security.description: All our vehicles are regularly maintained and covered by comprehensive insurance for your peace of mind.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: Customer service available 24/7 to meet all your needs, wherever you are in Morocco.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: A modern and diverse fleet to meet all needs, from economy to luxury vehicles.

item1.title: Company Founded
item1.description: Opening of our first agency in Casablanca with a fleet of 20 vehicles.

item4.description: Over 500 vehicles and 15 agencies throughout the kingdom, serving thousands of customers.
